result.execSummary:
The defendant Patrick E. Bass was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Richland County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Conditions:  $100 restitution to DJ's Kwik Stop; 1 set of costs ordered by the Court. Obey rules/regulations of probation. Attend, pay for, and successfully complete any treatment or educational programs ordered by the agent. 0 days credit in the event of revocation.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt: 15CF115 and 16CF95. Defendant Patrick E. Bass in court with attorney Lui Moefu. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. DA informs Court of the parties' plea agreement calling for amendment of Count 1 in 15CF115 to 943.01(1)/criminal damage to property and Def's pleas to that charge, as amended, and as well Count 2/theft in 15CF115 and Count 3/obstructing in 16CF95. Remaining counts of 16CF95 to be dismissed/read-in. Def pleads no contest to the charges stated. Court's colloquy on pleas. Finding of guilty. Sentence: withheld for 2 years probation with conditions to include $100 restitution in 15CF115; 1 set of costs, to be entered in 15CF115; obey rules/regulations of probation; attend, pay for, successfully complete treatment or educational programs ordered by the agent; credit for time served: 14 days, to be entered in 16CF95.
Plea/sentencing hearing on March 29, 2017 at 04:00 pm.

Attorney Lui Moefu in court for Defendant Patrick E. Bass. Defendant Patrick E. Bass appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. DA Harper states this was set for a possible plea/sentencing.  Def PB had called DA earlier stating he could not be here, and was to contact his atty.  He said he was not able to contact him.  DA's office told him to call in to the court at the time of hearing.  DA Harper asks for WA, to be stayed until next hearing of 3-29-17 at 4:00pm.  So ordered.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 29, 2017 at 04:00 pm.
DA's office has requested this warrant be withdrawn.
from DA's office - warrant that had been submitted for the Judge's signature can now be withdrawn
Status conference on March 21, 2017 at 01:30 pm.
Phone call from Atty. Moefu - has been in contact with his client and requests calendaring in order to quash the warrant
Warrant (to be signed by judge)

2:05 p.m.  Attorney Lui Moefu appeared by phone means for Defendant Patrick E. Bass. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Patrick E. Bass not in court.  Atty. M states he's tried to get a hold of def by phone but been unable to reach him.  Warrant stay lifted - warrant now ordered.
Status conference on March 10, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

10:28 a.m.  16CF95 and 15CF115, adjourned initial and status respectively.  Calendared for 10 a.m. today.  Attorney Lui Moefu in court for Defendant Patrick E. Bass. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Patrick E. Bass not in court.  DA asks for warrants in both cases, stayed until 3/10 at 1:30.  So ordered.  Status conference scheduled for March 10, 2017 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on March 6, 2017 at 10:00 am.

Adjourned initial in 16CF95 and status in 15CF115. Defendant Patrick E. Bass in court with attorney Lui Moefu. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Parties request adj. to 3/6.  Status conference scheduled for March 6, 2017 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on February 15, 2017 at 01:30 pm.

3:10 p.m.  Defendant Patrick E. Bass not in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lui Moefu in court for Defendant Patrick E. Bass.  DA requests warrant.  Atty. M states he's not sure why def is not here.  Court notes that def's appearance had been required for today's hearing.  Warrant ordered.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 29, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

2:51 p.m.  Defendant Patrick E. Bass appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Lui Moefu in court for Defendant Patrick E. Bass.  DA asks for reset - states def has to meet certain conditions before the parties can proceed further in this matter.  6/29 at 2:30 for further adjourned initial.  Court reminds def that he needs to be here.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 29, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 4, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance at 04-20-2016 11:00 am

Defendant Patrick E. Bass in court with attorney Lui Moefu. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. DA states that the parties are working towards resolution; def needs time to take care of "conditions precedent."  Initial appearance not yet completed, Court completes the initial at this time - charges stated and def informed of his rights including right to prelim. Atty. M states defense will waive the time limits for prelim. Counsel asks for status scheduling rather than prelim. Court's colloquy with def re prelim time limits waiver. Prelim time limits waived. Court sets AIA 4/20 (AIA as reminder prelim not yet done).  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 20, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance at 02-24-2016 10:00 am
Adjourned initial appearance at 02-03-2016 10:00 am
Adjourned initial appearance at 02-03-2016 10:00 am
Adjourned initial appearance at 02-05-2016 10:00 am
Adjourned initial appearance at 01-05-2016 10:00 am

Atty Moefu is on line for Defendant.  Defendant Patrick E. Bass in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Atty LM states def. does now qualify for SPD.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 5, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Initial appearance at 01-05-2016 01:15 pm

Defendant Patrick E. Bass not in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Atty Moefu appears via telephone, states def was released on signature, no longer qualified for SPD.  DA requests warrant. Court will reset this matter for January.  Initial appearance scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 01:15 pm.
